step_feedback.feedback: You performed the inhalation step well, engaging your body muscles effectively.  Focus on maintaining even muscle tension throughout the breath.
Good job placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to breathe deeply into your abdomen, visualizing the fluid movement.
While your inhalation was good, try to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest more effectively.  Focus on slow, controlled breathing.
The exhalation needs more attention. Try to fully relax your muscles as you exhale and visualize pushing the fluid out.  Focus on a slow, controlled exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to visualize fluid movement during inhalation and exhalation.  Focus on slow, controlled breathing and full muscle relaxation during exhalation for better lymphatic drainage.
